alert.note: Alert for Marion; Newton County Lower Elevations; Northwest Searcy County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 5:11PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Searcy, northeastern Newton, southwestern Marion and southeastern Boone Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 511 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Olvey, or near Harrison, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Harrison... Western Grove... Valley Springs... Dugger... Olvey... Crawford... Bellefonte... Everton... Pindall... Zinc... Yardelle... Eros... Bruno... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Marion; Newton County Lower Elevations; Northwest Searcy County Higher Elevations
